headline: Lululemon Athletica Inc. (LULU): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on Lululemon Athletica Inc., CompanyCharts’s Substack by Charts&Companies. headline: Zacks Industry Outlook Highlights Lululemon Athletica, Ralph Lauren, Under Armour and Hanesbrands
